trans-unit.source: Specifies the padding mode and parameters to use with RSA signature creation or verification operations.
Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.

The current instance and `obj` are equal if `obj` is a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> instance and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> property of the two objects is equal.
The object to compare with the current instance.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> object.
The current instance and `other` are equal if the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> property of the two objects is equal.
The object to compare with the current instance.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> instance.
The hash code for this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> instance.
Gets the padding mode of this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> instance.
The padding mode (either <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode"></xref>) of this instance.
Indicates whether two specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> objects are equal.
The Equality method defines the operation of the equality operator for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> values.
Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> values are equal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> property values are equal.
The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether two specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> objects are unequal.
The Inequality method defines the operation of the inequality operator for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> values.
Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding> values are unequal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Mode%2A> property values are different.
The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are unequal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets an object that uses the PKCS #1 v1.5 padding mode.
An object that uses the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode"></xref> padding mode.
Gets an object that uses PSS padding mode.
An object that uses the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePaddingMode"></xref> padding mode with the number of salt bytes equal to the size of the hash.
Returns the string representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding"></xref> instance.
The ToString method returns the value of the `RSASignaturePadding.Mode.ToString` method.
The string representation of the current object.
